title: Muang Thai Oy
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Japanese, Thai, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Thai and sushi restaurant inside a shopping center - access from the inside of the shopping center or outside via inner court. Lunch is all-you-can-eat buffet and meat-based but there are several vegan options marked on the buffet table includes daily varying tofu-based course, rice, spring rolls, soup, salad and sushi. Dessert includes vegan or non-veg chocolate.
